nv4gV3j: Sorry for the bad handwriting. Can marinate longer than two hours, but must be a minimum of thirty minutes.
UOhtzVP: If aioli is too spicy, add more mayonnaise, if too mayonnaise-y, add more sriracha. Toast the sesame seeds in a clean, dry, hot skillet. Keep them moving constantly. Should only take a couple minutes. They’ll become golden brown and give off a very nutty smell.
